dialogue: I don't know how we managed to survive that attack!
Don't worry! I am 100% confident in my abilities!
Well done everybody! We have some great news! We managed to recover loads of half-burnt documents that should potentially give a name to the head of this whole operation!
However, because they are half-burnt, I will need some time with my research department to use our algorithms to re-create the missing parts and piece them all together..
Well what else would you be doing?
In the mean time, we must make sure that the enemy do not cut off our power supply..
Why not? Don't we have backup generators?
We do, but they won't supply us with enough power to do this specific task. We need all the power we can get!
Great. Just when I finally got comfortable..
